definitions.definition: to be the king or queen of a country:
examples: Queen Victoria reigned over Britain from 1837 to 1901.

definitions.definition: to be the main feeling or quality in a situation or person:
examples: The bomb attacks produced a panic which reigned over the city.

definitions.definition: the period of time when a king or queen rules a country:
a period when a particular person, feeling, or quality is very important or has a strong influence:
examples: his successful reign as manager of the team
